channel.title: Kubernetes on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 25, 2019
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth, that has to do with things that interest me:

  • data science
  • data in general
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog-post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me, for the week just ending.

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 50 & Year End!
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth, that has to do with things that interest me:

  • data science
  • data in general
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog-post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me, for the week just ending.

NOTE: I started with these roundup posts in the beginning of 2017 as a way to force myself to write, and - so far, so good. It is now coming up on Christmas and New Year, and I will take a break with these posts and come back in the beginning of next year.
